short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analysing EE Distribution site for products and important data

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool will help you save a lot of time finding profitable opportunities in EE Distribution. 

➤ Problem

EE Distribution doesn't provide a catalog out of the box for you to process them in bulk to find profitable opportunities. Due to this, we have to go and check each product page to see if its a good buy.

➤ Solution

This tool helps you analyse the product list pages and product pages to create a custom catalog for you on the go. Once the page analyses is complete, you can go to the dashboard and download all the necessary details of products processed so far. The best part is, you can open a Product list page and continue your other work while we analyse the list for you!

➤ Main Features

1. Analyses of single product page to add it to the list
2. Analyses of the list page adding all the products to the list
3. Ability to download all the analysed products in one short.
4. Ability to filter the products for only In-stock items in your download file ignoring out of stock, backorders or upcoming products.

Note : Download file is in CSV format which contain - UPC Code, Min Price and Max Price for the product, Product Name, Product Code, Product Link of EE Distribution page.
